appraisal.reason: According to this newsletter, Confession is Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not 12:00pm to 12:40pm. On Saturdays it is from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. There are no Confession times listed for Sunday.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: According to the parish bulletin, Confessions are heard for half an hour before all Masses (or by appointment), not only 12:35–13:05 Monday and Wednesday–Friday. They therefore take place before every scheduled Mass, including the Saturday Vigil and Sunday Masses, and also before the Monday 6:30 pm Mass. There is no public Mass on Tuesday, so no scheduled Confessions that day.
